creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: landscape with buildings and figures in foreground; detailed trees and foliage throughout; blue-grey mountains in background; album contains twelve landscape paintings in a book; pages next to paintings and front and end pages are gold flecked; wood cover with paper label
marks: untranslated inscription, on label, on front cover
title: Leaf from Landscape Album
